overview: The wild and theatrical Tubes take over London! Features live footage of the band's 2004 ""Wild West"" performance at the Shepherd's Bush Empire in London. Tracklist includes: ""White Punks On Dope,"" ""Talk To Ya Later,"" ""Don't Want To Wait Anymore,"" ""Tip Of My Tongue"" and more. Features Vice Squad's Becki Bondage on ""Don't Touch Me There.
title: The Tubes - Wild West Show
